name: instant-data-lake
label: Instant Data Lake
short_description: Deploy a free, one-click data lake, automation pipeline, or BI dashboard in minutes.
long_description:
This deployable architecture bundles three powerful, zero-input variations into one tile. Choose the solution that's right for you: 
1. Base Data Lake: Instantly run SQL on any file you upload. 
2. Auto-Ingestion: Connect SaaS apps (like Salesforce) to your data lake. 
3. BI Dashboard: Build interactive dashboards from your files.

diagrams.description: Choose from three variations. All provision a 'lite' Cloud Object Storage bucket and 'lite' SQL Query instance. The variations add 'lite' App Connect for automation or 'lite' Cognos Dashboard Embedded for BI.

features.title: Choose Your Solution
features.description: Select the variation that fits your exact need, from a simple SQL query to a full BI dashboard.

features.title: Zero-Input Deployment
features.description: No configuration needed. Click 'Deploy' and all resources are created with unique names.

features.title: Completely Free
features.description: Uses 'Lite' plans for all services, so you can deploy and use any variation for free.

flavors.name: base
flavors.label: Base Data Lake (SQL Only)
flavors.short_description: For querying files. Provisions a COS bucket and a SQL Query instance.
flavors.long_description: This is the simplest variation. It provisions a 'lite' Cloud Object Storage (COS) bucket and a 'lite' SQL Query instance. The SQL Query instance is pre-configured to read from the COS bucket. Ideal for data analysts and developers who need to run SQL on static files immediately.

flavors.name: appconnect
flavors.label: Data Lake + Auto-Ingestion (App Connect)
flavors.short_description: For automated pipelines. Adds App Connect to pipe data from SaaS apps.
flavors.long_description: This variation provisions the Base Data Lake (COS + SQL Query) and adds a 'lite' App Connect instance. It's perfect for building automated data pipelines. Use the no-code builder to pull data from apps like Salesforce or GMail and save it directly to your data lake bucket.

flavors.name: cognos
flavors.label: Data Lake + BI Dashboard (Cognos)
flavors.short_description: For visualization. Adds a drag-and-drop Cognos dashboard builder.
flavors.long_description: This variation provisions the Base Data Lake (COS + SQL Query) and adds a 'lite' Cognos Dashboard Embedded instance. It's the 'last mile' of analytics, allowing you to go from a raw file to a shareable, interactive BI dashboard in minutes using a drag-and-drop editor.
